entry.title: Game: Donkey Kong Country Returns (Wii, 2010) (5)
entry.content: We played three levels tonight. It was pretty fun. My wife and I had a bit of a disagreement about what was fun about the game. She really likes collecting everything and exploring the area, trying to do harder things. In contrast, I find that annoying and prefer to just go through the obstacle course as fast as possible. But, the secret of marital bliss is she tells me what to do, and I do it, so I repented. =)

entry.title: Game: Pac-Man CE DX (X360, 2010) (4)
entry.content: Today I finished getting As or above on every event in Pac-Man CE DX. My ranking across the whole game is 5,100/245,281 or in the top 2.07%. It's a really fun game. I think I like the normal mode the most. The time trial is fun, but I think it's too easy to cheese out and ignore the ghosts and just take shortcuts, so it eliminates a bit of the unique fun of CE-DX. Such an awesome game.

entry.title: Game: Pac-Man CE DX (X360, 2010) (3)
entry.content: I got the Championship I Ghost Combo... but I got LAST place: 9,483/9,483!

entry.title: Game: Gran Turismo 5 (PS3, 2010) (6)
entry.content: I still need to get a gold on the Formula GT expert race (I currently have a silver) and the rest of the special events. I've decided to not do the A-Spec Endurance races at all, because they are insulting. I tried doing the GT race this morning, but had monkeys climbing all over me... which was very difficult.

entry.title: Game: Pac-Man CE DX (X360, 2010) (2)
entry.content: I've been playing this about every two days since I bought it. Two days ago I got all the achievements---I reached the Championship I maze and just did the next one to get the final achievement. Today I did the Ghost Combo on Championship I... it is really hard! I never noticed in the others that you need to beat a relatively low local-high score (30) to even complete it, but it is very difficult to get that many ghosts in this, because there aren't sleeper ghosts. I'll have to study it more to do it.
